item.title: NISS-Merck Meet-Up: Open Source Software in Pharma
item.description: Use of open access software, especially R, is becoming prevalent in pharma. There is a tremendous amount of interest, but many do not understand the basic landscape regarding regulatorsâ€™ thoughts, the groups that have been working in this area and what has already been accomplished. This meet-up will discuss this topic from different viewpoints, including an expert from the R Validation Hub (the group that has probably given the deepest thought to this topic), regulatory, and practitioners who have used open access software for submissions in the device field.
